abstract.sentence: On the 3rd meeting, all participants presented their concrete ideas, visions, and requirements to the device and a discussion brought the decision on all the properties of the prototype.

actions.sentence: User interface designer and industrial designer will make a prototype.
Marketing expert will do an evaluation

decisions.sentence: Those decisions that you consider of high importance for your role with a . Write fragmented notes.
Fancy and spongy look - banana shape. big buttons close to the banana center.
Speech recognition supported - solar cells requirement + batteries.
Size to fit with display fixed to 5 times 10 centimeters.
Peeling-off the fruit will recover the hidden buttons

problems.sentence: Mark those that you consider of high importance for your role with a *
Available display too big - needs to be cut. material of peeling problematic
